Collection.LongName: OMI/Aura Ozone (O3) DOAS Total Column Daily L3 Global 0.25deg Lat/Lon Grid
Collection.DataSetId: OMI/Aura Ozone (O3) DOAS Total Column Daily L3 Global 0.25deg Lat/Lon Grid V003
Collection.Description:
The OMI/Aura Level-3 (Global 0.25deg Lat/Lon grid) Total Column Ozone Data Product OMDOAO3e (Version 003) is now available ( http://disc.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aura/OMI/omdoao3e_v003.shtml ) from the NASA Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center (GES DISC) for the public access.
OMI provides two Level-2 total column ozone products (OMTO3 and OMDOAO3) based on two different algorithms. This Level-3 global total column ozone product is derived from OMDOAO3 which is based on the Differential Absorption Spectroscopy (DOAS) fitting technique that essentially uses the OMI visible radiance values between 331.1 and 336.1 nm. In addition to the total ozone column (best quality data, satisfying the shortest path length) and its precision this product also contains some ancillary parameters such as cloud fraction, cloud height, etc. The short name for this Level-3 OMI ozone product is OMDOAO3e and the lead Algorithm scientist for this product and for OMDOAO3 (the data source of OMDOAO3e) is Dr. Pepijn Veefkind from KNMI.
(The shortname for this Level-3 OMI product is OMDOAO3e) OMDOAO3e product files are stored in Hierarchical Data Format (HDF-EOS5). Each daily file contains data from the day lit portion of the orbits (approx 14 orbits) and is roughly 80 MB in size. For browsing and extracting data from these files, some software and tools are made available from the site: http://disc.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aura/tools.shtml
A Readme document containing brief algorithm description and file spec are provided by the OMDOAO3 Algorithm lead (see http://disc.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aura/OMI/omdoao3e_v003.shtml .
Collection.CitationForExternalPublication: ORIGINATOR: Pepijn Veefkind PUBLICATION DATE: 2012 TITLE: OMI/Aura Ozone (O3) DOAS Total Column Daily L3 Global 0.25deg Lat/Lon Grid

OnlineResource.Description: Access the OMI Level-3 global 0.25x0.25 deg Total Column Ozone product (OMDOAO3e) by FTP.

OnlineResource.Type: GET SERVICE : GET WEB MAP SERVICE (WMS)

OnlineResource.Description: WMS get map data example for variable OMDOAO3e:ColumnAmountO3. This request retrieves the latest available data at the given BBOX. To define a specific time, add to the end a time value, such as &Time=2013-08-01
